item.title: Footnotes, TikTok’s crowdsourced fact-checks, launches in the US
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: All U.S. TikTok users are able to view the notes that have been rated as helpful and submit their own ratings in return.

item.title: TikTok adds new parental controls, tools for creators
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: The social network is bringing new parental controls to Family Pairing, its feature that allows parents to link their accounts with their teen's account to customize safety settings.

item.title: Space Force bets on commercial entrants in $4B satcom contest
item.dc:creator: Aria Alamalhodaei
item.description: The Space Force is leveraging commercial competition for the next phase of its PTS program.

item.title: Nvidia AI chip challenger Groq said to be nearing new fundraising at $6B valuation
item.dc:creator: Julie Bort
item.description: AI chip startup Groq is in talks to raise a fresh $600 million at a near $6 billion valuation, sources tell Bloomberg, although the deal isn’t yet final and terms could change.

item.title: Luma and Runway expect robotics to eventually be a big revenue driver for them
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Szkutak
item.description: Both Luma and Runway have reportedly held conversations with self-driving car and robotics companies as they look toward the future.

item.title: Google says UK government has not demanded an encryption backdoor for its users’ data
item.dc:creator: Zack Whittaker
item.description: Google refused to tell a U.S. senator whether the company had received a secret U.K. surveillance order demanding access to encrypted data, similar to an order served on Apple earlier this year.

item.title: Anthropic reportedly nears $170B valuation with potential $5B round
item.dc:creator: Marina Temkin
item.description: The new round is being led by Iconiq Capital, with the possibility of a co-lead investor joining.

item.title: SOSV bets plasma will change everything from semiconductors to spacecraft
item.dc:creator: Tim De Chant
item.description: SOSV is investing in more than 25 plasma-related startups over the next five years.

item.title: Cash App users can now pool money for group payments — even with non-users
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description: Cash App's new feature lets users pool money with a group to pay for expenses like vacations and gifts.

item.title: Google’s NotebookLM rolls out Video Overviews
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: With this new capability, NotebookLM is taking a more visual approach to helping users understand different topics and ideas.

item.title: OpenAI launches Study Mode in ChatGPT
item.dc:creator: Maxwell Zeff
item.description: OpenAI's Study Mode aims to help students develop their own critical thinking skills, rather than just giving answers.

item.title: Spotify hints at a more chatty voice AI interface in the future
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: Spotify says AI will allow for "much more interactive" consumer experiences in its app.

item.title: Tea app disables DMs after second data breach exposed over a million private messages
item.dc:creator: Lauren Forristal
item.description: Dating safety app Tea experienced a second data breach in as many weeks, exposing over a million sensitive messages between users.

item.title: YouTube rolls out age-estimation tech to identify US teens and apply additional protections
item.dc:creator: Sarah Perez
item.description: YouTube is introducing age-detection technology to identify teens on the platform in the U.S. and apply protections.

item.title: Google’s AI Mode gets new ‘Canvas’ feature, real-time help with Search Live, and more
item.dc:creator: Aisha Malik
item.description: The tech giant is rolling out a new Canvas feature, the ability to get real-time help with Search Live, and the option to search what you see while browsing.

item.title: Telecom giant Orange warns of disruption amid ongoing cyberattack
item.dc:creator: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai
item.description: The telecom giant, one of the largest in the world with customers in Europe and Africa, said customers are experiencing ongoing disruption to its services due to an unspecified hack.

item.title: Elon Musk’s Boring Company to build Tesla tunnels under Nashville
item.dc:creator: Sean O'Kane
item.description: Construction could start fast — but that speed has endangered Boring Company workers in the past.

item.title: Jack Dorsey’s Bluetooth messaging app Bitchat now on App Store
item.dc:creator: Amanda Silberling
item.description: Jack Dorsey's Bitchat is now available on the App Store, but security researchers have questioned the app's privacy claims.

item.title: Microsoft in talks to maintain access to OpenAI’s tech beyond AGI milestone
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Bellan
item.description: Microsoft is reportedly in advanced talks with OpenAI for a new agreement that would give it ongoing access to the startup’s technology even if OpenAI achieves what it defines as AGI, or advanced general intelligence. If the deal goes through, it would clear a key hurdle in OpenAI’s transition toward becoming a fully commercial enterprise.

item.title: Get inside Disrupt: Volunteer at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
item.dc:creator: TechCrunch Events
item.description: We’re looking for curious, driven volunteers to join our team at Moscone West from October 27–29, and help power one of the most iconic startup events in the world.
